name: Install Packages
description: Install packages inside the LXC container. Supports both Alpine Linux (apk) and Debian/Ubuntu (apt) package managers.

parameters.name: Packages
parameters.description: Space-separated list of packages to install. For Alpine Linux, use APK package names. For Debian/Ubuntu, use apt package names.

parameters.name: OS Type
parameters.description: Operating system type: 'alpine' for Alpine Linux (apk) or 'debian'/'ubuntu' for Debian/Ubuntu (apt).

commands.description: Install packages using the appropriate package manager (apk for Alpine, apt for Debian/Ubuntu)
